name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
categoryPath: Clothing/Women's Plus/Women's Plus Bottoms/Women's Plus Jeans

reviews.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
reviews.reviewText: Ok finally found a jean that fits me fairly well. I am 51 years old, 5'3 and have a big tummy. I have to try on at least 5-6 pairs of jeans before finding a pair that works for my proportions. Since I am shorter, I need short length ( they call them petite here) I am not truly a petite in other clothing tho. I love the darker washes and this is the lightest color I will wear. They feel great, wash well and seem to hold their color and style. The price is the best! They stay up where they belong. I have tried jeans from the "fancy big girl" store and they are just too low cut. I am always trying to pull up the jeans that are cut to stay down! So glad these are around and affordable!
reviews.title: love these jeans!

reviews.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are GREAT! I'm used to wearing Talbot's jeans ($90 and up) but needed to replace some of my clothes since I've lost a bit of weight and can't pay that kind of money any more. These Just My Size jeans are great. They've got just a bit of stretch.They're comfortable and made well. I just wish there was a greater color selection.
reviews.title: Great choice for plus size jeans!

reviews.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
reviews.reviewText: This is more a comment about the manufacturer rather than Walmart. I am very short and whenever I can find them, I purchase petite plus-size jeans. Normally, I don't have a problem with the waist size, but the length of the inseam is always too long, by about four to six inches. I don't mind a little extra length, but when I have to take four inches off the cuff because they are too long, it gets old really fast. Other than that issue, they are comfortable, and fit in the waist and hips.
reviews.title: Just My Size Jeans

reviews.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 pair identical jeans same size, same length but different colors. One pair is too big and the other is too tight. One pair is over 4 inches too long, the other pair are just right. Where is the quality control for this manufacturer?
reviews.title: Sized incorrectly

reviews.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Slimming Classic Fit Straight-Leg Jeans, Petite
reviews.reviewText: I've bought these before and will very likely buy them again. They are, as I said above, very comfortable and well fitting, nice looking jeans. As an older lady, I don't go with fads so I prefer a more classic style of jeans, as these are. I really like them and wear them everywhere (almost).
reviews.title: Very COMFORTABLE and well fitting
